episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4001_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came to the ruins
with Trevor and Jacq in search of
mysterious stones...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4001_1001_02:
I sure hope we can find some of these mysterious
stones around here.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4001_1001_03:
According to multiple reports, they’ve apparently
been found in Pasio’s ruins.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4001_1001_04:
In other words, there’s a good chance that we’ll
be able to find some, too!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/6801_1031_01:
Pokémon from all over the
world are gathered here!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/6801_1001_01:
Whenever I see Pokémon from other regions, I
can’t help but observe them closely.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/6801_1001_02:
Encountering unfamiliar Pokémon fulfills our
intellectual curiosity!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_02: I’m Volo! Just an ordinary merchant!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_03:
If there’s something you’re looking for, please let
me know! You won’t find a better bargain!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_04:
Ah, well, we’re not really looking for something
to buy.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_05:
We’re searching for these odd stones that look
like this.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_06:
Hmm, I see... That is indeed something I’ve never
seen before.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_07:
Unfortunately, I don’t have anything like that
among my wares.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_08: It’s not easy doing business in a new land, is it...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_10: Let me look it up in my Pokédex real quick!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_12: It’s a Pokédex. You haven’t heard of it?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_14: It automatically registers Pokémon you encounter.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_16:
Simply venturing off to wherever your curiosity
takes you, with your knowledge growing as you
encounter Pokémon...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_17: Just the thought of that excites me!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_18:
Yes, I know what you mean! I want to travel to
all kinds of places with my Pokédex!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_19:
My dream is to register Pokémon from all around
the world one day!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_20: Oh my! What a wonderful dream!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_21:
I’m sure it won’t be easy, but I look forward to
seeing you complete your Pokédex one day!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_23:
What about you, Volo? Are you interested in
the Pokédex?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_24: I actually developed a Pokédex app in Paldea.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_27:
So I want my students to use my app and learn
more about our beloved Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_29:
You’re all quite interesting! Oh, how you tickle
my curiosity!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_30:
Investigating the odd and novel is key to any good
merchant’s success!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_31:
How about we see how our Pokémon stand up to
one another in battle? That way, I can also test
your knowledge, too!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_38:
I’ve got no reason to turn down this invitation—I’ll
give it my all too!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_39: Then let’s split into two teams!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_41: It’s always fun battling with Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_43:
Mr. Jacq! I want to learn more about how you
developed your Pokédex!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_44: Could I bother you again to discuss it?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_45: Of course! I want to get to know you better, too.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_47: I also research Pokémon myths as a hobby.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_48:
So I’d like to share my knowledge with you and
help you complete your Pokédex, Trevor!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_50: We should introduce Volo to the others too.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_51:
Oh, I appreciate the offer, but...I’d like to keep my
presence a secret.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_52:
There’s someone I really don’t want to be seen by
on this island.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_54: Now, now! We’ve all got our reasons, don’t we?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_55: Well then, see you in a few days!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_56:
There’s something about him that I can’t quite put
a finger on...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_57: But he does love Pokémon—that’s for sure!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_58: Yes! He seems very knowledgable too!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4002_1001_59: I hope I can become good friends with Volo!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_01: Let’s all have fun and learn a lot today!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_03: Mr. Jacq! Where did Pokémon come from?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_05:
Well, I suppose...I’ll start off by talking about a
certain Mythical Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_07:
Mew’s genetic composition is said to possess the
information of all Pokémon...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_08:
Ah, in simple terms, “genetic composition” means
something like a blueprint for an organism.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_09:
It’s been said that if the information of all
Pokémon is written in that blueprint...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_10:
then Mew must be the very first Pokémon—the
ancestor of all Pokémon, basically!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_12: Then where did Mew come from?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_13: Ahaha... Didn’t see that one coming...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_14:
If only Ms. Raifort were here to provide some
historical knowledge to help me out...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_15:
Um... So this is a story—well, more of a legend,
really—that people from a long, long time ago
would tell...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_16:
“In the beginning, there was only a churning
turmoil of chaos.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_17:
“At the heart of chaos, where all things became
one, appeared an Egg.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_18:
“Having tumbled from the vortex, the Egg gave
rise to the Original One.”
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_19:
This was Arceus, the creator of all things—the
Pokémon known as a deity!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_20: I dunno what that means, but it sounds cool!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_21:
It does, doesn’t it? Why, Arceus is said to be the
creator of both humans AND Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_23: Legend says that Arceus is the origin of life!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_24:
As you can see, there are still lots of mysteries
about Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_25:
And there still isn’t a definitive answer to your
question of where they came from.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_26:
There are many other theories on this subject, so if
you’re interested, please feel free to do your own
research after class today!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_28: Hello, Volo! Thanks for your help today!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_29:
It was no problem! I can’t help chiming in on the
subject of myths...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_31:
but you explained everything in a way the children
could understand easily!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_32:
I don’t even know if they understood what I was
talking about!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_33:
The origin of living things and Pokémon
mythology... What interesting stories those were.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4003_1001_34: I couldn’t help getting absorbed in them.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_01:
I see... So your shared interest in the Pokédex is
how you all know each other.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_02: Oh? Looks like Togepi wants to say hello, too!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_04: Oh... Sounds like you’re being well taken care of.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_06:
I heard that N can understand what Pokémon
are saying.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_08: Wow! WOW! What an amazing skill!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_09: What did Togepi say just now?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_10:
She said she appreciates Volo for always taking
good care of her...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_11:
The sweetness of her voice speaks to Volo’s love
for her.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_13:
Well, observing my Pokémon includes taking care
of them, of course!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_14:
I was just really curious to learn more
about Togepi!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_15:
More importantly, I’m interested in the fact that
you can understand what Pokémon are saying!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_16:
Your partner Pokémon are Unova’s legendary
Dragon-type Pokémon, right?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_0401_18:
The jet-black Pokémon that assists those who seek
to make an ideal world!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_0402_20:
The white Pokémon that helps those who seek to
build a world of truth!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_22:
If you’d like to get to know me better, it might
help for you to meet my friends.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_23:
What beautiful Pokémon! I would expect nothing
less from Legendary Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_24:
...And you can understand what they say as
well, N?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_27: what about a Pokémon that’s considered a deity?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_29:
I’m not sure. I’ve never met a Pokémon like that.
But I’d love to find out if I ever have the chance.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_30:
Oh, no! I just remembered I was in the middle of
doing something.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_31:
I need to bring this mysterious stone to
Professor Bellis.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_33: I showed you a picture of it when we first met!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_34:
According to Professor Bellis’s research, they react
to the bond between a Trainer and their Pokémon,
similar to sync stones.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_35: And in the process, they release powerful energy.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_36: This is the stone in question.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_37:
Oh my! This is my first time actually seeing one
in person...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_39:
If sync stones are already being put to practical
use on Pasio...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_40:
then I assume these stones are being utilized in a
similar manner?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_41:
No. Unlike sync stones, which can be integrated
into our Poryphones...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_42:
we haven’t figured out a safe, controlled, and
compact way to put these stones to practical use.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_43: I see. Sounds like a real conundrum.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_44: (If those stones are what I think they are...)
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4004_1001_45:
(Looks like I’ll need to lend a hand to the
researchers here.)
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4005_1001_02:
I understand that you’re helping to develop
technology that will integrate those mysterious
stones into the Poryphone!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4005_1001_03:
Well, you’ve certainly got your ear to the ground!
Where did you hear this?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4005_1001_04: I’m a merchant—getting the latest news is my forte!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4005_1001_05:
I heard it’s been a challenge figuring out how to
keep that technology both safe and compact!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4005_1001_06:
Yes, precisely! There are several ways we could
approach this if we disregard safety altogether...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4005_1001_07:
But it’s easier to collect data if the finished product
is accessible to everyone!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4005_1001_08:
In order to control the enormous energy released
by the sync stone ultimate...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_01:
I took it upon myself to conduct some research on
those mysterious stones.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_02:
Why don’t you put your expertise to good use and
help their integration, Jacq?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_04:
Yes, you! You’re the developer of a Pokédex app,
after all...
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_05:
and you’re so good at teaching new concepts
to others!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_07: Wow! You’ve written down so many ideas!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_08:
I don’t have expert knowledge on these devices,
but I put together some ideas that seemed easy to
apply from my mercantile perspective!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_09:
I know I’m the one making the request, but I
thought it might help you out!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_10: What do you say? Would you like to give it a try?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_11:
I agree with Volo! I’m sure you can do it,
Mr. Jacq!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_0401_13:
Ahaha... You sure are putting high expectations
on me!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_0402_15: How could I say no after all this encouragement?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_16: All right! If it’ll help everyone, I’ll do it!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_18: Let’s head over to the lab right away!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_19: Huh? Aren’t you coming too, Volo?
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_20: I have plans to meet with some people after this.
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_21: OK, I’ll see you later, then!
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4006_1001_24:
(In the end, it’s just a matter of using them before
they use you.)
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4007_1001_03: (Even if it takes me decades or centuries...)
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4007_1001_04:
(Even if my desires are destroyed by a
single outsider...)
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4007_1001_05:
(This time, I will finally succeed at subjugating
Arceus...)
episode_event_ch0297_ch0298/4007_1001_06:
(I will make the secrets of this world mine...and
create a new, better world!)
